caption.title: Projected changes in important Bioclim variables on the island of Borneo identified in Table 1.
caption.p: Images represent changes in Bioclim variables relative to the 1961–1990 climate surfaces, projected to 2040, 2070, and 2100. Changes in temperature variables (Bio6, Bio10, and Bio11) are presented as °C; changes for precipitation variables (Bio12, Bio16) are presented as percentages.
